website_summaries.verdict: A durable solar cover that will last three swim seasons or more with proper care.
pros: Cover can be cut to fit in-ground pools
6-mil thickness is more durable than other solar covers
cons: Tends to blow off in higher winds
Doesn’t work well in indirect sunlight, and those in colder climates may be disappointed

customer_reviews.title: about 15 months,  decomposed. fragile like paper.
customer_reviews.text: about 15 months, decomposed. fragile like paper. I can easily tear it up by hand. like the other user's comment, don't be fooled by the 3 years warranty. it's just a word on the page, no contact no instruction on how to claim the warranty. expect this as a annual consuming item. take it or find a better alternative to share.
customer_reviews.author: speeder

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I seem to buy a new solar cover every year, but this one is going to be around for awhile. My pool was twice as warm as it was last year, almost to the point we needed to put the hose in it too cool it down.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend. Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for cover. Works better than the solar rings with the palm trees on them. Light weight enough to remove without the roll up device. Pool heats up great with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Not very heavy gauge, too light to properly lay flat.
customer_reviews.text: My last pool cover lasted 2 years, but was heavier material. It Didn't produce as much trapped air when the circulating pump starts. I'm trying the dark blue compared to the clear diamond shape to see if it makes a difference in pool temperature. It's been on about 20 days and so far I don't like it as much as my first cover which was .12 mil. Twice the price as this one. This one doesn't list the Mil, and I've looked for the manufactures web site to see how thick this one is. Can't find a manufacturing web site anywhere. What does that tell me??????
customer_reviews.author: DennisT

customer_reviews.title: It was a waste of money for me, and has become garbage.
customer_reviews.text: This was less expensive than the ones I am used to buying from my pool supply store. It didn't take me long too understand why. I found it to be made of cheap, flimsy material that won't stay covering the small pool I have. If I try to sweep off the leaves, it moves with the sweeping. The bubbles are very small, compared to what I am used to, and it won't heat the pool. We have been having cold nights but warm days in the 70s and 80s. The water remains too cold to use the pool. I have relegated it to the garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E. Peoples

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time buying this product. It really helps keep the pool warm and clean. It is a little bulky and hard to handle, but I am looking into getting a roller attached so I can just roll it up each use.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne malarae

customer_reviews.title: Easily cut to fit pool
customer_reviews.text: I like that this pool cover won’t blow off. I was able to easily cut it with a scissor to fit my in ground pool. I do have dogs that wanted to walk on it and had to be very careful to train them not to. (They can swim but are small dogs and with the cover they may get tangled and drown in it.) I live in Texas and am using the cover during the cooler months to keep debris out of our pool. (We do not winterize our pool and I get tired of all the leaves, etc. I have to clean out.). This does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to tailor for unusually shaped pool
customer_reviews.text: I have a pool with an unusual shape and wanted an inexpensive cover that could be cut to fit. This cover was generously sized and more heavy than I expected. It was easy to cut it to fit but I had to be careful the cover didn’t drift during the process. Sizing it to fit has helped keep it in place. It reduced heat loss but central Florida has been unusually overcast and cold so I can’t tell how well. Will try to update as the cold season goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cox

customer_reviews.title: Not good on a salt water pool.  Bubbles disintegrating.  We may have too much salt in it.
customer_reviews.text: This cover was fine but did not last 3 years in my intex pool with salt water. The plastic bubbles began disintegrating after about a year. The pool filter was full of little blue plastic dots. I just ordered another on by accident but figured its cheaper than alot of them, so what do you expect? I think its because ofthe salt. We live in FLA too but the pool is mostly shaded.
customer_reviews.author: Karen EC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Extremely thin. It was damaged in two spots. Didnt bother returning cause we just cut the damaged end off. Won't buy again because of 1)how super thin it is. Wind blows and it moves, pool pump turns on and it gets pushed to one side because the water is moving. 2) it came with two holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Only needed to use it a few times but did bring my pools temp from 79 degrees to 90 in about 6 hours. (Full Sun 89 degrees with 80% humidity) I'm 5'4" 110 lbs and had no problem taking off or putting it on without help. I order a 12x24 oval but was a little larger around ,maybe 14x28 and rectangle not oval shape. still works and use the extra to secure it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Carma

customer_reviews.title: Helps.
customer_reviews.text: Helps to warm the water and keeps the pool cleaner. Remember to face the bubbles down, into the water! I don't know if the instructions tell you that or not but that is how they should go to get the most out of this.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: My first pool cover
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pool cover I've ever purchased to qualify my opinion. I was hoping to use my FL pool year-round but it's too chilly for me. The blue Thermo-Tex 2831224 Swimming Solar Pool Cover is exactly what I ordered and seems to be of decent quality, no delusions there and I feel that I got what I paid for. It has not been effective in warming my pool nor keeping the temp constant, but to be fair my pool is not in the sunlight all day long, perhaps only most of the afternoon. It has seemed to help with reducing the rate of evaporation.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This cover is junk.
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this item, twice in 3 years, this one is 8 months old and is completely falling apart. Amazon will not help you with the 3 year warranty and the company will not honor it either. So, save your money and pay a little more for a better one, not made from this company. We DO NOT reccomend this product at all. The pieces are floating in the pool and getting in our skimmer. It's junk.
customer_reviews.author: celine

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good cover
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good cover, but don't cut it like others have said they have. I cut it into smaller pieces to make it easier to handle. And the corners sink down and fold under. Totally not the fault of the company. I wish I could give it 5 stars. Maybe once money isn't so tight, we will order another one and I think I will be able to move the tasting up to a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: We have a smaller pool and this was easy to cut and fit
customer_reviews.text: We have a smaller pool and this was easy to cut and fit. It works really great! We put it on in the morning and by the afternoon it is nice and warm for the little ones. Very pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Weese

customer_reviews.title: Good value cover
customer_reviews.text: As others said it's just a big piece of colored bubble wrap, but that's what all solar pool covers are. That said, this is a good value for the money. Easily cuts to fit your pool shape, and relatively easy to put on/take off. In the end we don't use it as much as we thought because it's still bulky enough to constantly take on and off, clean and store, but without using a roll up cover that would be the experience for any cover as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pinnipal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: This cover has less mil than many of the others out there, but it serves it's purpose well. My pool water is noticeably warmer from using the cover, and the free chlorine levels are great due to no direct sunlight. A big advantage to the light weight is that it's easy to trim and roll up.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! I live in SW Fl and with this solar cover my pool is 1-2 deg warmer then without. Not sure if it’s because of the thin material? It is, in essence, bubble wrap. Not sure if I will try another brand down the road. Also it is a challenge to put on an take off. It looks dirty all the time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. The material is so thin that any wind will blow it around, so do the jets in the pool if the pump is still running when you put the cover on. Plus, it is constantly dropping little blue circles in the pool. Spend the money and get a thicker gauge plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B. Sherwin

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles breaking off into pool
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this product and it works great (got our mostly shaded pool to 90 degrees), however, after less than a year, all of the bubbles are breaking off and falling in our pool. Thought we would get at least one full season out of this before having to toss it. Would reccomend spending a little more money on a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: size and quality good
customer_reviews.text: All good and matched to specifications. Material is thinner than previous covers I purchased but the specs are correct. It does the job, just be careful when removing from pool as material is thinner and it will rip more easily than the thicker covers available. The price was so good that if it only lasts 1-2 seasons, I am fine with it!
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: Cover falls apart!
customer_reviews.text: The first few months after I got the cover it worked great and then it began to disintegrate due to the sun .after 6 months I had to throw it away and it took me over a week to clean out plastic bubbles that was left in the pool. 2 star rating because it worked well at the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: JUAN L OROZCO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover for our indoor pool
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived in perfect condition and fits my pool perfectly! We have an indoor pool and this cover solved our humidity problem. The water stays warmer and because there is less water evaporating and replacing, fewer chemicals are required. Easy to remove and replace—I can do it myself. I highly recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Dean296az

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well on our above ground pool. This cover kept our water so warm we had to take it off on really hot days so the water wouldn’t get too warm. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy R

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for keeping hot tub clean and warm ..... easily cut to fit .... wasn’t sure of the other hot tub covers so went with this bigger size thinking I would cut to fit a 6 person hot tub and it was a great choice and easy to fit ..... not for the winter but good enough to save on the heater in autumn and keeping out the fall leaves
customer_reviews.author: JMP

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, just unboxed it and was so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, just unboxed it and was so disappointed. Immediately I noticed it was not as thick as my previous one. I went back and looked at all the q&a to see what mil it was and it IS NOT 12 mil. This will melt together in the vegas heat on the roller. Looking for return options now.
customer_reviews.author: DraftyJungle

customer_reviews.title: Quality and honesty of product
customer_reviews.text: The product is not the same product that we ordered 2 years ago. This cover is thinner and a light blue in color. The old one was thicker and color of a deep blue. I do t think it will keep the pool as warmer. We ordered the exact product. I think the wrong product was shipped but my husband doesn’t want to take it off the pool to ship back.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind Cook

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, WASTE OF MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy, waste of money the plastic is as thin as the bubble wrap you get in mail packages if not thinner. It doesn't take much for the cover to blow-off. Spend a little more for a better cover. My old cover was over 5 years old and in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Light weight means it wont heat as fast as the thicker 12ml covers. But it is affordable for something that will have to be replaced pretty much every summer here in the desert heat.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight easy to take off and put on...very pleased. As light as it is it still helps hold in the warmth in our pool.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Folger

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to move.
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to use and it’s making my pool warm. I appreciated how light it was. I’ve had another cover before and it was too heavy and hard to move. This was a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to roll it up, especially when it's wet, so I'll probably get some sort of rolling syatem figures out. It sure does help with heating up the pool though. Happy overall. Good quality and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Keeps pool so much cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: We cover our pool nightly and what a difference it makes. Our neighbors have tall, bushes that emit these tiny, seed like particles by the millions. We carefully remove the cover and voila, a much cleaner pool. It is very light also, and really doe seem to retain some of Water temperature. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Nice Improvement
customer_reviews.text: The solar cover works as well as my Electric pool heater and I have gotten used to dragging it on and off. It also helps reduce the evaporation that I get due to my pool being in a windy area.
customer_reviews.author: The Rag Man

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I usually spend alot more money for these pool covers and decided to spend less this summer and this cover heated my pool just as good as the expensive ones! Will deffinently buy again when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Blows off the pool
customer_reviews.text: If there was 0 stars that’s what I would rate this cover. It is paper thin, and therefore blows off the pool every time we try to put it on. It’s a waste of money, spend the extra $30 to get a nice one.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: We'll see how it holds up. IMPORTANT NOTE: ...
customer_reviews.text: We'll see how it holds up. IMPORTANT NOTE: you probably will want to buy the next larger size up, so you can cut it and fit your stairs and/or any other odd shapes exactly. I wish I had, and will do that next time. Hopefully will last a long time until then, though.
customer_reviews.author: Cherev

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This has been fantastic for our pool. We live in Florida so it’s already warm for most of the summer months, but this helps us start early! It was a little bit of a learning curve to take on and off at first, but now it takes like 30 seconds. Definitely worth the money over an expensive heater.
customer_reviews.author: Brady G.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: so far this cover is working great.....we have had 3 other covers...so far like this the best....lightweight....easy to move around....we have an above ground pool...
customer_reviews.author: laura grogan

customer_reviews.title: Barely lasted the season
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last as long as we thought -the bubbles and edges started to disengrate
customer_reviews.author: Jane B

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: This cover has been great! I can open my pool in mid-June and keep it open until mid-September. I very rarely leave it off overnight during pool season. One person can maneuver it if necessary, but it’s much simpler with two. It’s been very durable for two summers now.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Langtree

customer_reviews.title: A must for your pool!
customer_reviews.text: They only last for a couple of years, here in Arizona, but works great at keeping water warm and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Twila

customer_reviews.title: Sauna like pool temps
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My pool is nice and warm every time I take the cover off. Great price does the same thing other more expensive ones do.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon white

customer_reviews.title: Good value but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had holes to let puddle build up through like most high end covers. It's ok and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Mendiola

customer_reviews.title: Saving on our water bill!
customer_reviews.text: We use this cover to keep the water in our pool from evaporating so quickly. So far so good. Saved $100 on our California water bill last month. Over the summer it was outrageously high.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen G

customer_reviews.title: Just Doesn’t Work
customer_reviews.text: This did not warm the pool even a little bit and I live in FL so it had lots of help from the sun. Very disappointed and wish I could’ve returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Gg H.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this for your pool. Love mine. I does heat the water 10-20 degrees. Most excellent for those that need a little extra warmth when the weather changes from hot to slightly cool.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: It works well!
customer_reviews.text: Our pool has never been this warm. We had an older solar blanket that didn’t work as well as this one does. It’s not too heavy, is easy to put in and out, but heavy enough to not blow out if the pool.
customer_reviews.author: pat f

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product itself as it is lightweight and easy to handle and store. On the other hand, we have wind gusts that take it right off the pool and send it flying. A heavier weight cover, like the one we had before, might have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Furry Mama

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if it was a little thicker material but overall works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: josh logan

customer_reviews.title: This cover started to disintegrate after only one season of use
customer_reviews.text: I use the solar cover on my above ground pool for 4-5 month out of the year and then store it in a clean dry environment. I started seeing signs of disintegration 1/2 way through the second summer of use and when I took it off to store it today I was able to put my hand through several spots. I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ma Bell

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable!!!
customer_reviews.text: The cover lasted about 5 months in total! Every time we went to take it off this year it was so brittle it just kept tearing. Look for something better made and last longer. Definitely not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value. You won’t find this price locally.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderful. Buy a few sizes too big bc this floats. Warmed up pool well and kept debris out.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: 10 degrees warmer!!! Great!
customer_reviews.text: It really is effective. The pool water went up 10 degrees Fahrenheit.
customer_reviews.author: Elodie

customer_reviews.title: Works like its supposed too
customer_reviews.text: It does what its supposed to, easy on and off. its held up well so far and doesn't sink
customer_reviews.author: JohnH107

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to handle, does a good job.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly needed a cover to prevent evaporation, but it also warms the pool. I got the least expensive because I needed a lightweight one easily handled by one person. It does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria J. Wahlstrom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really warm up the water very much. Thinking of buying another better one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: its a large bubble wrap that does not adequately keep debris out of the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Warner

customer_reviews.title: faded right away.
customer_reviews.text: best to buy a better quality , this one faded right away, now its white/clear/and some blue.
customer_reviews.author: linda alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great but heavy
customer_reviews.text: This worked great. It's just really heavy so I'd like to get a roller bar to roll it out of the pool when we want to swim.
customer_reviews.author: L. W.

customer_reviews.title: Heats up pool nicely
customer_reviews.text: Cover works great! But opened it and it smells so bad, like mold/mildew. I had to spray down with bleach. But all and all good cover. Does heat the pool up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Drew H-M

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I live in the Southern California area and it keeps the above ground pool water comfortably warm. I had my doubts, but, yes, it does work! My friend lives a few miles from me, she has the same pool I do, but doesn't use this cover and her pool is so much colder (a good 12 degree difference) than mine.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: Good price but only good for 1 year on salt water pool
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this last year, keep cover on during winter in Tucson and early spring. I was able to swim beginning end of April. Early fall a hole appeared, now its not usable. Tears when I rolled it up in January 2020. Be prepared to buy new every year.
customer_reviews.author: magic bullet user

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Used it once n defintley got the chill out of the pool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heat loss
customer_reviews.text: Its fine especially for the price. Not sur the heat loss compared to a heavier blanket
customer_reviews.author: captain

customer_reviews.title: Thin solar cover but decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Thin but decent for the price! We cut them into 4ft x 6ft squares and zip tied them to pvc rims to make squares that are free standing for our pool. It worked good until the wind came up!
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie  D

customer_reviews.title: Will buy every year
customer_reviews.text: It kept my pool so nice and warm. Also clean.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mil

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Rather thin but good price. Recommend when pulling off pool to store outvof sun to last longer
customer_reviews.author: sixfourlion

customer_reviews.title: cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Product did not even last one swim season. Cheap price for cheap quality
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Streeter

customer_reviews.title: Cover doesn’t float properly
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product! The bubbles do not hold air and thus the cover doesn’t float properly making it extremely hard to fold up and get out of the water. It is not like any other pool cover I’ve ever purchased, just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Meggan Holzer

customer_reviews.title: too thin and light to work well...
customer_reviews.text: It is really thin and light... Doesn't heat in the sun as well as our old clear one and is so light and flimsy that even a little breeze and its wadded up in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy solution for keeping the pool warm for a longer swimming season.
customer_reviews.text: This was an inexpensive solution for keeping our swimming pool water warm enough to swim for an extra two months here in southern California. It lowers our propane usage even in the cooler months because it keeps so much heat in.
customer_reviews.author: California user

customer_reviews.title: 14x32 would have worked better, that being said it did help warm up ...
customer_reviews.text: It was actually too small, 14x32 would have worked better, that being said it did help warm up the pool and keeps pollen etc out of the poolalso helps with evaporation. Light weight, good construction
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Valenti

customer_reviews.title: Just like bubble wrap for packing
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality.Just like bubble wrap for packing.Not worth the money.Cover has a 3 year warranty but I doubt it will last one season.Spend a little more for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Product as described
customer_reviews.text: Helps maintains temperature of the water. Good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Andrés Puentes

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to trim to exact size if needed
customer_reviews.text: It sure keeps the heat in the pool over night
customer_reviews.author: jay weiland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It keeps my pool so warm, it's durable, and easy to take on and off! So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cover won’t lay flat
customer_reviews.text: Cover won’t lay flat after trimming and fitting. It has uneven seam. See photo.. This morning Dec 3, it’s plain to see the welded seam is the issue. The seam doesn’t expand and contract the same as the bubble material. I bought a cover not pieces made from scrap. Please send me a one piece cover.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It was what I thought it was I was happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a few months. Definitely not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It fell apart in January.. it was bought in oct. the air bubbles started falling off in pool
customer_reviews.author: dbihn

customer_reviews.title: ONLY LASTED ONE YEAR.
customer_reviews.text: This says it has a 3 Year manufacturer’s limited Warranty in the ad, but I bought this last year and it's falling apart already. Don't know how to return it for a replacement or refund?
customer_reviews.author: SHERYL A.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive cover that did the job.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little too big for our pool but was easy to trim to size.
customer_reviews.author: Smoore70

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive way to heat a pool
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, a fews days in the sun and it raised the temperature from 70 to 80 degrees! There was also alot less evaporation
customer_reviews.author: Brandi lemay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover for the money. Does what it needs to do.
customer_reviews.author: DJR

customer_reviews.title: falling apart
customer_reviews.text: only used it for 1 year and its already starting to fall apart!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Luther Lim

customer_reviews.title: Epic fail
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. It’s a big mess to remove too.
customer_reviews.author: Vicemily

customer_reviews.title: Good pool cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits our pool perfectly. Our 9 yr old son & I can pull the cover on without much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect as described.
customer_reviews.text: The quality appears average and it works as described. We are not sure how long it will last but hope to get a couple of seasons out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 1 1/2 years
customer_reviews.text: This cover is too thin. I purchased it in April 2018 and just tossed it in the garbage yesterday. It was falling apart and leaving plastic in the skimmer. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: This product should get negative stars, very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. It is already breaking apart and has been doing this for months. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J Williams

customer_reviews.title: Keep your pool warm
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for the money. Just wanted to keep the water warm during cool nights. Did what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bubbly cover
customer_reviews.text: We used this cover for one summer and it became bubbly. Very disappointed. We have had a pool for 35 years and never had a solar cover do this.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to throw on the pool
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to throw on the pool, even for one person. Definitely added a few weeks to our swimming season. Seemed to work pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS WORKS GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I used it planning on putting a pool heater later. Turns out It works way better than i planned. You wont regret it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prices and and if they have warranty
customer_reviews.text: I use it on swiming pool i love it keeps things out heats up pool nice love it
customer_reviews.author: Rose m

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price

product_meta.title: Thermo-Tex 2831224 Swimming Solar Pool Cover, 12' x 24', Blue
product_meta.description: Thermo-Tex 12'x24', 3-Year, Rectangle, Cali Blue, In-Ground Solar Swimming Pool Cover that will extend your Swimming Season by up to 2 months helping to maintain the water temperature on cool nights and cloudy days.
feature_bullets: Thermo-Tex Solar pool covers will extend your swimming season and lower your operating costs.
According to the us Department of energy, Solar pool covers reduce chemical consumption, reduce pool heating costs, and reduce water evaporation. "U.S. Department of energy"
Thermo-Tex Solar pool covers are made from high quality, UV stabilized polymers that resist degradation caused by the sun and pool chemicals.
Lighter weight design makes it easier to put on and take off of your pool.
3 Year manufacturer’s limited Warranty. Made in USA and Canada.
